Russia attacked the very heart of our democracy when they interfered in the 2016 election. With 2018 just around the corner, they will be back. We must act now. Today, I’m introducing the Secure Elections Act, a bill that will fortify our election systems.

How do Americans feel about the tax bill Republicans passed yesterday? I’ll let the numbers speak for themselves.

Since the tax bill was introduced, I’ve gotten 122,981 letters about it:

97.6% opposed it

2.4% supported it

I put forward a motion that says let's obey our own rules, but it will be interesting to watch the vote and see how it turns out. Who truly cares about the debt on either side of the aisle? Who's willing to say I'm for tax cuts, but I'm also for spending restraint? http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DRmxBQLX0AY2lE3.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/943979577059225601/vid/320x180/mZ7Dx-ah4ybU_cre.mp4
